text: Not bad, but too expensive. And the size was too small.

text: Consistently great pizza with great variety of toppings and styles. Service is fast too.

text: Authentic Italian pizza. Made just the way it was back in 1933, I'm sure. No other pizza compares to this one
author: Spongebob Squarepants
